title: Aaniye Pudunga Venandaa Lyrics Wagah
stanzas:
aaniye aaniye aaniye
aaniye pudunga venandaa
oru aaniyum pudungavenandaa

sandayila kiliyatha satta illa
sandhanatha thadavatha motta illa
paruchayil vangatha mutta illa
pathu mani aanalum matta illa

aaniye pudunga venandaa
oru aaniyum pudungavenandaa
sandayila kiliyatha satta illa

sandhanatha thadavatha motta illa
paruchayil vangatha mutta illa
pathu mani aanalum matta illa

kanavella kaathu kedakku
manasellam poothu kedakku
uravella uri kedakku
usura kudukkum ooru

ungala pola nanga pongavilla
engala minja yaarum illa
sakkarakkattinu perum illa
unmayila nanga thana nalla pulla

vasayella edhukku irukku
palasellam mari kedakku
thimurellam meeri kedakku
thotta therikkum paaru

kaasu panamella thedavilla
paasam irundhale pothavilla
vesam pottu naanga vaazha villa
rosam patta thanae theva illa

aaniye pudunga venandaa
oru aaniyum pudungavenandaa
sandayila kiliyatha satta illa

sandhanatha thadavatha motta illa
paruchayil vangatha mutta illa
pathu mani aanalum matta illa

aaniye aaniye aaniye
aaniye pudunga venandaa
oru aaniyum pudungavenandaa

seo.title: Aaniye Pudunga Venandaa Lyrics Wagah
seo.description: Get the complete Aaniye Pudunga Venandaa Lyrics Wagah from Wagah. Read the lyrics penned by Arunraja Kamaraj and composed by D Imman and sung by Shenbagaraj. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Arunraja Kamaraj, Wagah, D Imman, Shenbagaraj, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
